alert.note: Alert for West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:24PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Marshall, central Walsh and southern Pembina Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 223 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Hensel, or 19 miles northwest of Grafton, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported gusts of 50mph around Cavalier. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Park River, Drayton, St. Thomas, Hoople, Edinburg and Crystal. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 173 and 189. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
